title: The Making of woollen and worsted yarn
brief_description: Silent film illustrating methods of processing raw wool to produce a yarn ready for weaving. Each process is illustrated, first using the simplest of hand equipment and then by modern machine methods. The final sequences compare old and new methods of shearing, carding, combing and spinning.
